content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

Here's the implementation of the `extract_julia_code` function in Julia:

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    lines = split(md, r"\n"))
    
    code_blocks = []
    
    for line in lines
        if starts_with(line, "```julia")) && ends_with(line, "```"))
            push!(code_blocks, [line[10:end-3]], ""])
        elseif !isempty(code_blocks) && starts_with(line, "```"))
            last_code_block = code_blocks[end]
            push!(last_code_block[2], end), line)
            pop!(code_blocks)
        end
    end
    
    # Join code blocks with newlines
    joined_code = ""
    for block in code_blocks
        joined_code *= block[1] * 2
        joined_code *= "\n"
        joined_code *= block[2]
        joined_code *= "\n\n"
    end
    
    return joined_code
end
```

This function iterates through the lines of the markdown document and extracts all the code blocks. It then joins these blocks together with newlines as required by the prompt.
